description: This file defines theme configurations for a Flutter application, including color schemes and style settings for light and dark themes.

classes.name: AppThemes
classes.description: A class encapsulating color and theme data for the app's light and dark themes.

methods.name: AppThemes.lightTheme
methods.description: A ThemeData object configuring UI elements with a light theme style.

methods.name: AppThemes.darkTheme
methods.description: A ThemeData object configuring UI elements with a dark theme style.
